cdn.name: Google Libraries API
cdn.desc: The Google Libraries API is a content distribution network for the most popular, open-source JavaScript libraries.

cdn.name: CloudFront
cdn.desc: Amazon CloudFront is a web service that makes it easy to distribute content with low latency via a global network of edge locations.

cdn.desc: Consistently rated one of the best-performing CDNs in the industry.

cdn.name: Akamai
cdn.desc: Akamai's industry expertise for Content Delivery, Application Performance, and Streaming Media help companies build a better web business.

cdn.desc: A large distributed system of servers deployed in multiple data centers in the Internet.

cdn.name: Amazon Web Services
cdn.desc: Amazon Web Services (AWS) delivers a set of services that together form a reliable, scalable, and inexpensive computing platform "in the cloud".
